channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Validating String Parameter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Validating String Parameter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2257|2024-08-04T07:01:41.167Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20validating%20string%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Validating String Parameter Plugin 2.4 and earlier does not escape various user-controlled fields, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
